ResearchProjectDef.label: Bonewalker creation Vol. I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the construction of the bonewalker forge, as well as the creation of lesser bonewalkers at the forge.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Bonewalker creation Vol. II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the creation of greater bonewalkers at the bonewalker forge.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Bonewalker creation Vol. III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the creation of bonelords at the bonewalker forge.
